name: Drivesit-walkrunrid
body:
# drive sit | runwalkrid
## fea4x3  mod absmin absmax

### not overlap trainset testset, not ensemble classifier

* nn average accuracy not ensemble 91.6666666667
* adaboost 0.969387755102
* lr 0.923469387755
* svm 0.959183673469
* rf 0.969387755102


* maxDep 8 try10times average  not ensemble 0.976923076923 max 1.0 min 0.961538461538
* maxDep 10 try10times average  not ensemble 0.975384615385 max 1.0 min 0.938461538462
* maxDep 12 try10times average  not ensemble 0.963076923077 max 0.976923076923 min 0.938461538462* 
* maxDep 14 try10times average  not ensemble 0.973846153846 max 0.992307692308 min 0.938461538462
* maxDep 16 try10times average  not ensemble 0.964615384615 max 0.992307692308 min 0.938461538462
* maxDep 18 try10times average  not ensemble 0.972307692308 max 0.984615384615 min 0.961538461538
* maxDep 20 try10times average  not ensemble 0.966153846154 max 0.992307692308 min 0.938461538462
* maxDep 22 try10times average  not ensemble 0.968461538462 max 0.992307692308 min 0.946153846154
* maxDep 24 try10times average  not ensemble 0.969230769231 max 0.992307692308 min 0.907692307692
* maxDep 26 try10times average  not ensemble 0.952307692308 max 0.984615384615 min 0.907692307692
* maxDep 28 try10times average  not ensemble 0.974615384615 max 0.992307692308 min 0.961538461538



如果每个树 样本太少30 会陷入这2情况:
 拿着手机乱动会->walk rid 和手机放桌子上不动->sit
 拿着手机乱动会->sit drive 和手机放桌子上不动->walk

每个树100样本会克服这情况
